# Hiatea
## Overview
Name: Hiatea

Gender: f

Rank: Greater Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Giants, Females, Nature, Agriculture, Hunting, Childbirth

Titles:

Holy Symbol: Flaming spear

Alignment: NG

Origin of Worship: Giant

Core Worshippers: Giants

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Spear

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: +1 distance spear

Domains: Animal, Community\* (CD), Fire, Good, Plant, Sun, Weather\* (CD).
